/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, creating a corridor of urban life. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the concrete structures below. Cars of various colors are scattered along the road, hinting at the city's vibrant energy. In the distance, a large white building with a curved roof stands out, adding a touch of architectural interest to the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being enveloped by the cityscape.
